t: Lifetime Products - Wikipedia
s: February 11, 2025 - In 1972, Lifetime Product's founder, Barry Mower, made a sturdier basketball pole for his backyard using pipe, plywood, and a basketball rim. Seeing the potential in what he had constructed, he placed an ad in the local classifieds and made his first sale. His business eventually became a sporting goods ...
